name.ja: <ruby>古代の機械暗黒巨人<rt>アンティーク・ギアダークゴーレム</rt></ruby>

text.en: This card's name becomes "Ancient Gear Golem" while on the field or in the GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; you cannot Set cards for the rest of this turn, also add up to 2 "Ancient Gear" cards and/or "Geartown" from your Deck to your hand, except "Ancient Gear Dark Golem", then discard 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Gear Dark Golem" once per turn. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.
